@graph.name: Mtb phylogeny
@graph.description:
Estimate a phylogenetic tree from whole genome sequencing data for M. tuberculosis

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Tree thinking for tuberculosis evolution and epidemiology](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/evolution/tutorials/mtb_phylogeny/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
